article: If you are a teenage boy and want to succeed in life, you'd better read this great book! From Boys to Men, by American author, Michael Curian, tells teenage boys that they are living through the  _  years of their life. There is no reason for them not to love life. You may think that only your body is growing at the moment.  _  the book says your mind is too. The book tells teenage boys that they need to  _  their bodies and minds to grow. To do this, they should stop  _  their time playing computer games and should  _  playing sports. Sports, the book says, keep you  _  and teach you important life skills. They also teach you  _  to be a leader and work as a part of a team. The book also tells boys how to love life  even if  they are bullied at school. It says boys should not be afraid of such school bullies . The book says that, to become the man you want to be, you have to believe in  yourself  . Most importantly, the book says, you must always  _  to succeed. Never be happy with what you've got and try to achieve more.
